::Aerotaur::
    He watches them leave.  As soon as he realizes that they're leaving He 
shouts "Hey any one want...a ...lift."  By the time he finishes he knows 
they're out of range.  He turns back and hauls the CR chamber out of the 
ship.  He keeps a record of their course on his sensors.  He takes off 
carrying the CR chamber in his massive feet.  He manages to catch up slowly.
